original_title: Armistead Maupin Is a Man I Dreamt Up
overview: An affectionate portrait of San Francisco, and of the man whose Tales of the City have inspired thousands to go there. Maupin relates a life story more bizarre than his fictional characters(including a meeting with Nixon), while local eccentrics and ex-colleagues dish and praise lavishly.
title: Armistead Maupin Is a Man I Dreamt Up
